root.name: Street Fighter EX Plus Alpha
root.description: For the first home version of Street Fighter EX, Capcom and Arika took the arcade-only Street Fighter EX Plus and added Dhalsim and Sakura to the character list. New home-only modes were also added.CharactersAkumaAllen SniderBlair DameChun-LiCracker JackCycloid BetaCycloid GammaDarun MisterDhalsimDoctrine DarkGarudaGuileHokuto (also appears as "Chi no Fuuin" version)KairiKenM. BisonPullum PurnaRyu (also appears as evil "Satsui no Hado" version)SakuraSkullomaniaZangief
